post_1.title: Introducing Scam Shield: Real-Time Protection is Here!
post_1.excerpt: BlockLang just got a major security upgrade! Meet Scam Shield - our new real-time protection against scams, phishing, and malicious websites.
post_1.content:
We're thrilled to announce the biggest update to BlockLang since launch: Scam Shield!

What started as a search result filtering extension has evolved into a comprehensive browsing protection tool. Scam Shield provides real-time security warnings using our advanced 0-100% trust scoring system.

What's New?

  • Instant threat detection - Get warned before visiting dangerous sites
  • Color-coded warnings - Green (safe), Orange (risky), Red (dangerous)
  • Smart caching - Trusted sites cached for 30 days, suspicious ones for 30 minutes
  • Privacy-first approach - Only domain names sent, never personal data

Free users get 5 automatic checks per day, while Pro users enjoy unlimited protection. This feature works seamlessly alongside our existing search filtering capabilities.

Stay safe out there!
post_1.author: BlockLang Team

post_2.title: Welcome to BlockLang Blog
post_2.excerpt: Learn about our journey building a privacy-focused browser extension and our mission to clean up the web.
post_2.content:
Welcome to the official BlockLang blog! We're excited to share our journey of building a privacy-focused browser extension that helps users take control of their search results.

BlockLang was born out of frustration with cluttered search results filled with irrelevant content. Whether it's language barriers, low-quality sites, or simply wanting a cleaner browsing experience, we believe users should have the power to customize what they see.

In this blog, we'll share updates about new features, tips for getting the most out of BlockLang, and insights into web privacy and user control.
post_2.author: BlockLang Team

post_3.title: 5 Tips for Effective Search Filtering
post_3.excerpt: Master the art of search filtering with these practical tips for using BlockLang more effectively.
post_3.content:
Getting the most out of BlockLang requires understanding how to set up effective filters. Here are our top 5 tips:

1. Start with Wildcards

Use patterns like *.ru to block entire country domains quickly.

2. Language Filtering

Block content in specific languages using language:ru format.

3. Target Specific Sites

Block individual domains like example.com for precise control.

4. Use the Quick Russian Filter

Toggle our built-in filter to instantly block 89+ Russian domains.

5. Regular Maintenance

Review and update your filters periodically to keep them relevant.
post_3.author: BlockLang Team

post_4.title: Privacy First: How BlockLang Protects Your Data
post_4.excerpt: Discover how BlockLang maintains complete privacy by processing everything locally on your device.
post_4.content:
In an age where data privacy is more important than ever, BlockLang takes a different approach. Unlike many browser extensions that send your data to remote servers, BlockLang operates entirely on your device.

Local Processing

Every filter you create and every search result we process happens locally in your browser. Your search queries, browsing habits, and filter preferences never leave your device.

No Tracking

We don't use analytics, tracking pixels, or any form of data collection. What you browse is your business, not ours.

Open Source Approach

Our commitment to transparency means you can verify exactly what BlockLang does with your data - which is nothing.
post_4.author: BlockLang Team
